parameters.description: Optional filtering on transaction state, state can be used to avoid downloading statements twice, use state link (PUT) to set state

companyId.description: Company id to associate with bankaccount

NewBankAccountRequest.description: Dto for new BankAccounts. May be expanded to include accountGroupId and agreementId.

approvalsRequired.description: Number of approvals needed for bank upload

hasBankIntegration.description: Account has bank intregration set. If false, must be handled by ZData

readyForPayments.description: Indicates whether account is ready for posting payments

UpdateBankAccountRequest.description: Dto for new BankAccounts. May be expanded to include accountGroupId and agreementId.

organizationNumber.description: Company organization number. If matched in Brnnysund, company name and adress will be overwritten

parentCompanyId.description: Id of parent company. Can be used to request subsidiary status for company. NOT IMPLEMENTED FOR EXTERNAL USE!

organizationNumber.description: Company organization number. If matched in Brnnysund, company name and adress will be overwritten

parentCompanyId.description: Id of parent company. Can be used to request subsidiary status for company.

name.description: Company name. Mandatory for companies outside Norway

country.description: Company country. Mandatory for companies outside Norway

rejectionCode.description: Rejection code if payment has been rejected by bank

rejectionMessage.description: Rejection message from bank, if payment has been rejected

success.description: Whether payments were dismissed or not

approvalsRemaining.description: Number of approvals before payment is sent to bank

bankCode.description: Clearing system bank code (Sort code, fedwire code, routing number). Normally used outside EU

statementMessage.description: If present, can be used for text on beneficiary's statement of account

singlePayments.description: Always send single payments to creditor. This will not work with credit notes.

CreatePaymentsRequest.description: A list of payments to create for a given account number.

errorMessage.description: Error message, only exists on error state
Error message (used if State is set to Error)
Error message (used if State is set to Error)

companyId.description: Company id to register associate with service

entryReference.description: This is a reference set on the statement entry level

transactionCount.description: Number of transactions associated with this statement

receiverName.description: Name of receiver. Used if the transaction is a payment.

receiverAccount.description: Account of receiver. Used if the transaction is a payment.

senderName.description: Name of sender. Used if transaction is a ingoing payment.

senderAccount.description: Account of sender. Used if the transaction is a ingoing payment.

errorMessage.description: Error message, only exist on error state
Error message (used if State is set to Error)

companyId.description: Company id to associate with user

password.description: Password (optional), if not set user will receive email to complete registration
